TypeSignature.Value: .class public ansi sealed beforefieldinit EventDescriptor extends System.ValueType

summary.span: 包含定义事件的元数据。

span.span: Contains the metadata that defines an event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此类表示在清单中定义的事件。This class represents an event defined in the manifest. 在编写你的清单之后, 使用消息编译器 (MC.exe) 生成资源文件。After writing your manifest, you use the Message Compiler (MC.exe) to generate a resource file. 该过程的副产品是包含在 C 中，事件说明符的标头文件，如下面的示例中所示。A byproduct of the process is a header file that contains the event descriptor in C, as shown in the following example. ``` EXTERN_C __declspec(selectany) const EVENT_DESCRIPTOR ReadEvent = {0x1, 0x0, 0x10, 0x4, 0x0, 0x0, 0x8000000000000005}; ``` 使用描述符的值来创建此类的实例如下面的示例中所示。Use the values of the descriptor to create an instance of this class, as shown in the following example. 关键字是一个无符号长整型值，不能转换为 long 类型的值; 直接必须使用`unchecked`语言关键字，才能允许分配。The keyword is an unsigned long value and cannot be cast directly to a long; you must use the `unchecked` language keyword to allow the assignment. ``` unchecked { readEvent = new EventDescriptor(0x1, 0x0, 0x10, 0x4, 0x0, 0x0, (long)0x8000000000000005); } ``` 在调用时使用描述符或方法。You use the descriptor when calling the or method. 有关编写清单和使用消息编译器的详细信息，请参阅[开发事件发布者](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/desktop/aa964766\(v=vs.85\).aspx)For more information on writing the manifest and using the message compiler, see [Developing Event Publishers](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/desktop/aa964766\(v=vs.85\).aspx)

MemberSignature.Value: public EventDescriptor (int id, byte version, byte channel, byte level, byte opcode, int task, long keywords);

.method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(int32 id, unsigned int8 version, unsigned int8 channel, unsigned int8 level, unsigned int8 opcode, int32 task, int64 keywords) cil managed
Public Sub New (id As Integer, version As Byte, channel As Byte, level As Byte, opcode As Byte, task As Integer, keywords As Long)
public: EventDescriptor(int id, System::Byte version, System::Byte channel, System::Byte level, System::Byte opcode, int task, long keywords);
new System.Diagnostics.Eventing.EventDescriptor : int * byte * byte * byte * byte * int * int64 -> System.Diagnostics.Eventing.EventDescriptor
MemberSignature.Usage: new System.Diagnostics.Eventing.EventDescriptor (id, version, channel, level, opcode, task, keywords)

span.span: The event identifier.

param.name: version

span.span: Version of the event.

param.span: 版本指示对事件定义的修订。

span.span: The version indicates a revision to the event definition.

param.span: 可以使用此成员和 ID 成员来标识唯一事件。

span.span: You can use this member and the Id member to identify a unique event.
Defines a potential target for the event.

param.name: level
param.span: 指定事件中包括的详细信息级别。

span.span: Specifies the level of detail included in the event.

param.name: opcode
param.span: 写入事件时正在执行的操作。

span.span: Operation being performed at the time the event is written.

param.name: task
param.span: 标识正在写入事件的应用程序的逻辑组件。

span.span: Identifies a logical component of the application that is writing the event.

param.name: keywords
param.span: 指定事件类别的位掩码。

span.span: Bit mask that specifies the event category.

param.span: 关键字可以包含一个或多个提供程序定义的关键字和/或标准关键字。

span.span: The keyword can contain one or more provider-defined keywords, standard keywords, or both.

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有关这些参数的详细信息，请参阅的特性[EventDefinitionType](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/desktop/aa382754\(v=vs.85\).aspx)复杂类型。For details on these parameters, see the attributes of the [EventDefinitionType](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/desktop/aa382754\(v=vs.85\).aspx) complex type.

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 从事件说明符中检索通道值。

span.span: Retrieves the channel value from the event descriptor.

value.span: 用来定义事件的潜在目标的通道。

span.span: The channel that defines a potential target for the event.

summary.span: 从事件说明符中检索事件标识符值。

span.span: Retrieves the event identifier value from the event descriptor.
The event identifier.

public: property long Keywords { long get(); };

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 从事件说明符中检索关键字值。

span.span: Retrieves the keyword value from the event descriptor.

value.span: 一个关键字，是用来指定事件类别的位掩码。

span.span: The keyword, which is a bit mask, that specifies the event category.

span.span: Retrieves the level value from the event descriptor.

value.span: 包括在事件中的详细程度。

span.span: The level of detail included in the event.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Opcode As Byte
public: property System::Byte Opcode { System::Byte get(); };

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 从事件说明符中检索操作代码值。

span.span: Retrieves the operation code value from the event descriptor.

value.span: 要在写入事件时执行的操作。

span.span: The operation being performed at the time the event is written.

public: property int Task { int get(); };

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 从事件说明符中检索任务值。

span.span: Retrieves the task value from the event descriptor.

value.span: 一项任务，用来标识正在写入事件的应用程序的逻辑组件。

span.span: The task that identifies the logical component of the application that is writing the event.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Version As Byte
public: property System::Byte Version { System::Byte get(); };

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 从事件说明符中检索版本值。

span.span: Retrieves the version value from the event descriptor.
The version of the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 版本指示对事件定义的修订。The version indicates a revision to the event definition. 可以使用此成员和 ID 成员来标识唯一事件。You can use this member and the Id member to identify a unique event.
